---
title: "Reading Group Schedule"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

The current schedule is


```{r, echo=FALSE}
dates    <- seq(as.Date("2020-03-17"), as.Date("2020-04-21"), by="weeks")
names    <- c("Song Liu", "Mark Beaumont", "Mauro Camara Escudero", "Mingxuan Yi", "Andy Wang", "Sam Tickle")
location <- rep("Fry Building 1.11", 6)
schedule <- data.frame(
  Date=dates,
  Name=names,
  Room=location
)
knitr::kable(schedule)
```
